 i will have my chars join when the 5th faction is decided
  Jonathan <jhogan@...> wrote: OOC:

BAsically you keep your characters (reducing the number somewhat (I think
max character usage is now somewhere in the range of 3-5), the story begins
a new as if the previous threads had never existed. You just have to
re-introduce the chars, however unlike before you'd most likely be on one of
the three ships when it crashed rather than being a stasis pod.

For example Talos and Megatron have both called for a check in to see who's
functioning, report in with your characters :)
